txt.en: You have found Hírkha, a lost nether-hound as you travelled through Ilmabiri. After introducing yourself to her, she seems willing to follow you. You should lead Hírkha to Kruha-sûrja, the guard post in the northern part of the sewers beneath the Sail-haven of Umbar Baharbêl.
You have been asked to stay on the look-out for a lost nether-hound as you travel through Ilmabiri.
'While you are travelling through the tunnels, I have a favour to ask of you.'
You have found Hírkha, a lost nether-hound as you travelled through Ilmabiri. You should introduce yourself to her.
'You found her!  This is such good news!'
TBD Lead the dog to safety
Find the lost dog, Hírkha
You spot a small brown dog
TBD Greet the dog
TBD Cute doggy stuff. He will follow you.
TBD You have safely led the dog back to the guard post
Talk to Lebíthi
Introduce yourself to Hírkha

'You found her! This is such good news!\n\n'I will be honest with you that I did not expect her to be found alive. She is lucky to not be inside the belly of a crocodile! I will see that she is returned to her owner. Hírkha must have been very brave to survive down here. Thank you for her rescue!'

A child of the Sail-haven has lost her dog after it ran into the sewers chasing a rat. Lebíthi has asked you to keep an eye out for the dog while you traverse Ilmabiri.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will fail if you are defeated or log out. If this occurs, it will be removed from your quest log and you will need to accept it again.</rgb>
Hírkha wags her tail and looks willing to follow you
Lead Hírkha back to Lebíthi

'While you are travelling through the tunnels, I have a favour to ask of you. A girl has lost her dog, Hírkha. They were walking through the Sail-haven when the hound took off, chasing a rat. She believes the dog followed the rat into the sewers and has not seen Hírkha since. If you happen to see a nether-hound on your trek through Ilmabiri, there is a small reward for her return.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will fail if you are defeated or log out. If this occurs, it will be removed from your quest log and you will need to accept it again.</rgb>
You have found Hírkha, a lost nether-hound as you travelled through Ilmabiri and have led her to safety at the guard post Kruha-sûrja. You should talk to Lebíthi.
Hírkha has reached safety
You have failed to lead Hírkha to safety
A Very Brave Dog
